name: Best Mom Ever Hand Stamped Spoon Christmas Gift Idea
description:
Here is a gift sure to please. One vintage silver plate "Best Mom Ever" spoon with a little heart hand stamped below the wording. These are sweetly packaged in a clear cello bag and tied with natural hemp twine or a satin ribbon. It will then be wrapped in a sheet of tissue paper to further ensure safe arrival to it's new home! 

The design of the silverware will vary depending on what I have in stock. I only choose the nicest pieces to work with so you can be assured it will be as lovely as this one!

All of my silver ware is vintage, so they are not new and most have been gently used! I only use vintage silverplate flatware with character and patina. No cheap, modern stainless steel here!

Each spoon will measure approximately 6 inches long or so. Each one is made to order so every one will be unique and different. I hand stamp each letter one at a time! 

I will be adding more designs soon! Please let me know if I can help with a custom order for spoons, forks, dinner knives, butter knives, wedding cake forks, wedding cake servers, etc. I have amassed a huge collection of beautiful vintage silverware! 

My normal production time is 7 to 14 days before shipping. If you need it sooner than that please let me know BEFORE you purchase and we can work out the details!

Your item will be shipped after my normal 7 to 14 day production time with USPS First Class shipping which can take approximately 2-5 days. International shipping can take 1 to 6 weeks to arrive and I have no control over any customs delay that may occur.

name: Stamped Vintage His and Hers Wedding Cake Forks Engagement Gift
description:
Here is a wedding or engagement gift sure to please. A pair of 2 vintage silver plate "Bride" and "Groom" wedding cake forks stamped in my Bridgette font. These are sweetly packaged in a clear cello bag and tied with natural hemp twine or a satin ribbon. It will then be wrapped in a sheet of tissue paper to further ensure safe arrival to it's new home! 

The design of the silverware will vary depending on what I have in stock. I only choose the nicest pieces to work with so you can be assured it will be as lovely as this one! Each set is made to order and will not be the same ones in the photo. You can also choose to change the font and you can leave your choice in the note to seller box during check out. 

All of my silver ware is vintage, so they are not new and most have been gently used! I only use vintage silverplate flatware with character and patina. No cheap, modern stainless steel here!

Each fork will measure approximately 7 to 8 inches long or so. Each one is made to order so every one will be unique and different. I hand stamp each letter one at a time! 

I will be adding more designs soon! Please let me know if I can help with a custom order for spoons, forks, dinner knives, butter knives, wedding cake forks, wedding cake servers, etc. I have amassed a huge collection of beautiful vintage silverware! 

My normal production time is 7 to 14 days before shipping. If you need it sooner than that please let me know BEFORE you purchase and we can work out the details!

Your item will be shipped after my normal 7 to 14 day production time with USPS First Class shipping which can take approximately 2-5 days to arrive. International shipping can take 1 to 6 weeks to arrive and I have no control over any customs delay that may occur. Contact me for Priority Mail shipping.

name: His And Her Necklace Set of 2 Hand Stamped Couples Necklaces
description:
This beautiful necklace set has the word "His" and "Hers" each with a heart design hand stamped on a thick 12 gauge aluminum rectangle.

This gauge of metal is stronger and more durable than the usual 14 gauge aluminum. Looks like sterling silver without the high price! This necklace set is the perfect gift for yourself and for that special someone in your life!

This listing is for a set of TWO necklaces. These necklaces will only be stamped as shown in the photos. If you'd like to change anything please let me know and I can make a custom listing for you.

The rectangular charm measures 1 1/4 inches long and is made from aluminum that will not rust. It may need to be polished occasionally just like any other jewelry grade metal. 

The ball bead neck chain is 24 inches long and made of stainless steel which will also not rust. The chains can be cut to any size with regular scissors or I can cut it to your size~just leave me a note when you check out. 

The charm is attached with a locking 99.9% silver jump ring that will not come apart like a regular jump ring. Each piece is hand made especially for you. 

The imperfections inherent in hand stamping contribute to the charm and character of each piece. Each piece is handmade by me!

PRODUCTION TIME AND SHIPPING DETAILS: Every piece in my shop is made to order. My current turnaround time is always between 7 to 14 days. before shipping. This is the amount of time it will take me to make your item due to my current amount of orders in progress. 

US ORDER Shipping: Approximate arrival speed for U.S. First Class Shipping is 2 to 5 days but that is never guaranteed. 

INTERNATIONAL ORDER Shipping: Approximate shipping time for International First Class Shipping is 1 to 6 weeks due to possible customs delays. I have no control over shipping speeds once I have shipped your package within my stated production time. Thanks!

name: His and Hers Bracelet Set Hand Stamped Hemp Cord
description:
This pair of aluminum His and Hers tie on bracelets are perfect for any couple! This listing is for 2 bracelets! 

These will only be stamped as seen in the photos. 

My tie on bracelets are now made with 12 gauge aluminum. These are strong and will not bend! They look great and polish to a bright shine! Much sturdier than the usual 14 gauge aluminum. The only personalization available on these is the cord color! 

INFO NEEDED TO COMPLETE ORDER: Please leave cord color numbers in the note to seller box during check out.
1. Cord Color Number from the last photo in listing. Choose a color for each bracelet. 

NOTE: These bracelets will only be stamped as seen in the sample photos. If no cord color choice is left during checkout then it will be shipped with the same cord colors as shown in the sample photos.

Aluminum is comparable to the look of sterling silver but without the high price. Each bracelet comes in your choice of colored 1 mm hemp cord.

HEMP CORD CHOICE: I now have 19 colors of hemp cord available! Please see the last photo and choose your favorite! I do have a large supply of hemp and cotton cord that has not been shown. If you are looking for a specific color not shown please let me know and I will see if I have it available. Thanks! 

Adjustable for you:
Just tie it on with a simple knot or bow! Make it as loose or tight as is comfortable for you. Should easily fit most wrist sizes. The stamped portion of the bracelet is 2 1/4 inches long and 3/8" wide aluminum metal and it is gently curved to fit your wrist. Each side will have approximately 7 to 8 inches of string to tie.  

Each piece is hand made especially for you. The imperfections inherent in hand stamping contribute to the charm and character of each piece. I make these myself and I take great pride in my work! See my feedback!

These are made from 1100 Pure Aluminum which is food safe and safe on your skin. There is a much lower rate of skin reaction with PURE ALUMINUM than with sterling silver.

SHIPPING AND PRODUCTION TIMES: Every piece in my shop is made to order. My current turnaround time is listed under the shipping and policies tab. This is the amount of time it will take me to make your item due to my current amount of orders in process. Your item will always ship within my 7 to 14 day production time frame. 

US ORDERS: Approximate shipping for USPS First Class Mail is 2 to 5 days to arrive. Shipping arrival times are never guaranteed..

INTERNATIONAL ORDERS: Approximate shipping time for International First Class Shipping is 1 to 6 weeks due to possible customs delays. I have no control over shipping speeds once I have shipped your package within my stated production time. Thanks!

name: BESTIE Bracelets Set of 2 Hand Stamped Best Friends Cuff Jewelry
description:
INFO NEEDED TO COMPLETE YOUR ORDER: 
These bracelets will only be stamped as shown in the photos. Please leave your 1 initial choice for each bracelet during check out. 

Bracelets will only be stamped on ONE side unless noted otherwise in the listing (This listing includes 1 heart design stamp and 1 initial on the inside edge.) If you'd like to make any changes please contact me before you purchase.

Adjustable for you:
Gently pull apart to put on and gently squeeze to close - simple! Should easily fit most wrist sizes 6 to 7 inches. If you have an extra small wrist, please let me know and I can make yours in a smaller size!

All adult size cuff bracelets are 14g thick, 3/8" wide and 6" in length and hand-formed. They are polished and shiny. Each piece is hand made especially for you.

The imperfections inherent in hand stamping contribute to the charm and character of each piece. The 6 inch size will fit an average wrist size of 6 to 7 inches but can be adjusted slightly to accommodate a larger or smaller wrist. 

These cuffs are 1100 Pure Aluminum which is food safe and safe on your skin. There is a much lower rate of skin reaction with PURE ALUMINUM than with sterling silver. 

SHIPPING DETAILS: Every piece in my shop is made to order. My current turnaround time is listed just above the shipping costs--see below. This is the amount of time it will take me to make your item due to my current amount of orders in process. Your item will ship within my 7 to 14 day production time frame. 

US ORDERS: Approximate shipping for USPS First Class Mail is 2 to 5 days to arrive. Shipping arrival times are never guaranteed..

INTERNATIONAL ORDERS: Approximate shipping time for International First Class Shipping is 1 to 6 weeks due to possible customs delays. I have no control over shipping speeds once I have shipped your package within my stated production time. Thanks!
